add.instrument.description: Here you can provide the financial instruments you want to be exposed to or just your passives(like money on banking account / saving accounts).
add.instrument.success.description: You have just added to your portfolio first finance instrument. Keep going, add the next one!
add.instrument.success.title: Great!
add.instrument.take_into_rebalance.label: Want to take into account in rebalance report
add.instrument.title: Create your model portfolio
common.name: Name
page.signin.description: Welcome back! You can continue to manage your investments
page.signin.password.too_long: Password is too long, max. 50 characters
page.signin.password.too_short: Password is too short, min. 12 characters
page.signup.description: Join Funds Tracker and begin managing your investment today.
add.cash.accounts.title: Add cash accounts
add.cash.accounts.description: Here you can provide all your cash accounts e.g. daily account you receive your salary, interest-free savings account or real cash. <bold>Maximum 10 accounts, min. 2 characters length each.</bold>
add.cash.accounts.empty: No accounts added. Add new by clicking button below.
add.cash.accounts.submit: Confirm and go to next step
page.welcome.description: Manage your investments from single place simply and purely thanks to Funds Tracker
add.portfolios.title: Add your portfolios
add.portfolios.description: Don't be limited to one strategy, divide your investments into <bold>independent portfolios</bold>. For example, you can separate your passively and actively managed portfolios. <bold>Maximum 10 portfolios.</bold>
add.portfolios.empty: No portfolios added. Add new by clicking button below.
error.component.title: Couldn’t load
error.component.description: If this issue continues, please contact support.
page.confirm.description: We've sent a verification code to your email address - <bold>{{email}}</bold> Please enter it below to confirm your email address. (Don't forget to check your spam folder.)
page.confirm.support: If you need help, please <support>contact us</support>
